task.title: Editing a message
task.shortdesc: The plugin enables original authors to edit their message at any time.

step.cmd: Press the button in the message you'd like to edit
step.stepresult: In the place of the original message text, a text area appears, allowing you to edit the message.

info.note: The same keyboard shortcuts as for writing a message apply here. To add a line break, press Shift+Return.

step.cmd: Click the button to save the message.
step.info: Pressing the button discards any edits you've done to your message.

result.note: Adobe XD often saves earlier states of cloud documents which you can later return to. As the plugin saves the chat messages in the document's metadata, they may exist in their original state in these earlier versions even after editing them.
